data.short_description: Able to interact with the top bar (the bar where you can minimise/maximise/close Discord) through the mini profile if it extends to the top of the screen
data.steps_to_repro: - Open a mini profile with a lot of roles plus a playing/listening status so the mini profile goes to the top of the screen - Hover over the top of the mini profile where the top bar is - Double click in that area - Observe the window
